titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to increase certain criminal fines, and for other purposes.
Clean Water Justice Act
Clean Water Justice Act

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
